subs.text: This is like the NBA playoffs of politics. Barr made a huge mistake in shipping the report when Trump Sports addicts can obsess over all this fresh plot.

There comes a point when the sins of the president are so huge that Congress, no matter which party occupies it, has an obligation to start impeachment. Think about it this way. How would you feel if the Repubs held the House and refused to impeach, at this point.
